mapper.sql: select restaurant_reply_no, to_char(to_date(reg_date, 'yyyymmdd'), 'yyyy-mm-dd') reg_date, content, score, member_id, restaurant_no from restaurant_reply
mapper.insert: insert into restaurant_reply ( restaurant_reply_no, reg_date, content, score, member_id, restaurant_no) values( restaurant_reply_no_seq.nextval, to_char(sysdate, 'yyyymmdd'), #{content}, #{score}, #{memberId}, #{restaurantNo})
